original_text: “If a man sells his daughter as a servant, she is not to go free as male servants do.
korean_text: 사람이 자기의 딸을 여종으로 팔았으면 그는 남종 같이 나오지 못할지며

sentences.original_text: If a man sells his daughter as a servant
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 남자가 자기 딸을 하녀로 판다면

sentences.original_text: she is not to go free
